info.name: Car WASH
info.description:
This collection contains all the backend API endpoints for the **Carwash Management Platform**.

It includes features for:

- üîê **Authentication** ‚Äì User registration & login using JWT
    
- üë§ **User Management** ‚Äì Profiles, roles, and permissions
    
- üöó **Car Management** ‚Äì Add/update user cars
    
- üßº **Carwash Management** ‚Äì Register and view carwash listings
    
- üß¥ **Services** ‚Äì Define services offered by a carwash
    
- üïí **Bookings** ‚Äì Book car wash appointments with slot or walk-in logic
    
- üì¶ **Orders** ‚Äì Track and process car wash jobs after booking approval
    
- üí≥ **Payments** ‚Äì Handle transactions and receipts
    
- üåü **Reviews** ‚Äì Allow users to rate and review services

item.name: Auth
item.description:
Handles user authentication and authorization:

- Register new users (business or car owners)
    
- Login existing users
    
- Returns a **JWT token** for authenticated access
    

üîê _Required for all protected routes:_

```
Authorization: Bearer <your-token>

 ```

item.name: User
item.description:
Operations related to user profile management:

- View personal profile
    
- Update name, phone, or password
    
- Deactivate or delete account
    
- Check user role (e.g., `car_owner`, `business`)
    

üß† _Useful for profile personalization or managing access permissions._

item.name: Car
item.description:
StartFragment

User car management:

- Add new cars
    
- View cars owned by the user
    
- Update or delete car records
    
- Set a default car for bookings
    

üìå _Only car owners interact with this section._

EndFragment

item.description:
StartFragment

Carwash business profiles:

- Business users can create or manage their carwash listing
    
- Public users can view all or specific carwash info
    

üíº _Business identity lives here._

EndFragment

item.description:
Manages the list of services offered by a carwash:

- Add, update, or delete services (e.g., "Full Wash", "Interior Cleaning")
    
- View available services
    
- Only accessible to users with `role: business`
    

üí° _Used during booking to select services._

item.description:
Let users reserve a wash slot:

- Book a service at a specific time or request "home service"
    
- View your past/future bookings
    
- Businesses can approve, reject, or manage incoming bookings
    

üß≠ _Acts as the gateway to creating orders._

item.name: Order
item.description:
Let users reserve a wash slot:

- Book a service at a specific time or request "home service"
    
- View your past/future bookings
    
- Businesses can approve, reject, or manage incoming bookings
    

üß≠ _Acts as the gateway to creating orders._

item.name: Reviews
item.description:
Post-service feedback system:

- Users can leave a review and rating
    
- Reviews are tied to completed orders
    
- Helps with business trust and visibility
    

üìù _Used to calculate average ratings and build user trust._

item.name: Payments
item.description:
StartFragment

Handles payment processing and transactions:

- Submit payment info for a completed order
    
- View transaction records by order or user
    

üí∞ _Useful for tracking financials and revenue._

EndFragment
